A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was visually appealing and it had few interesting action sequences but the overall story was a mess. In my opinion this movie is riddled with plot holes that just took me out of the experience and ruined my enjoyment\, I get Rian Johnson wanted to surprise us with plot twist after plot twist and  alot of the humor did not work at all. The movie overall felt superficial in my eyes and did not make sense the more I think about it and discuss it with my friends. It just felt like a slap in the face to star wars fans.
